reviewText: When you advertise an item, it should be mentioned at the very beginning that it doesn't contain all of the episodes of that season, if that would've been the case I wouldn't have bought it in the first place !
Title: In The Heat of the Night Season 4

reviewText: WARNING MISSING EPISODES ON SEASONS 4 AND 5!!!  While I love this show, I am puzzled and a bit upset that 2 episodes will be left off season 4 and 3 episodes are left off of season 5. Is this because 5 years from now they will offer one of those complete series packs so that to get the missing episodes we will have to dish out even more money!!!So be warned. But having said all that the show is great It takes on a ton of social issues. Racism is always just under the surface of every episode and many episodes takes on that issue. There is a good mix of off beat humor. This adds some relief when dealing with sensitive issues.A great show but missing episodes!!! See the website "tv shows on dvd" for the reason for the missing episodes as well as a list of the missing episodes for seasons 4 and 5.
summary: WARNING MISSING EPISODES ON SEASON 4 AND 5!!!

Title: In The Heat of the Night Season 4

reviewText: I am so happy to finally see more releases to DVD of the television series IN THE HEAT OF THE NIGHT, although I had to kinda laugh as this is the most unusual sequence release schedule I've ever seen for a series. First we had the 24 Hour Marathon release, then Season One, Season Eight and now Seasons Four and Five - but it's all good and I am happy to get them 'however' the studio wishes to release them. Season three (not yet released) and four is where this series really hits it's stride.Airing for 142 episodes (plus 4 TV movies) from 1988-1995, IN THE HEAT OF THE NIGHT was a great crime/drama series that starred Carroll O'Conner as "Chief 'Bill' Gillespie" of the Sparta Police Department in Mississippi and centered on a lot of small town politics as well as catching criminals. It was a role that was really suited for Carroll O'Conner, and of course, Alan Autry as "Lt. 'Bubba' Skinner" sure filled out his uniform v-e-r-y nicely! :o)This five disc set is the '90-'91 season and below is a brief summary of the episodes:(DISC 1)LESSONS LEARNED - Chief Gillespie is shocked by the seemingly uncaring reaction of the father of a murdered teenage prostitute.PERVERSIONS OF JUSTICE - Gillespie tries to calm public furor while investigating charges a science teacher molested a student....AND JUSTICE FOR SOME - Gillespie and Virgil have different game plans concerning the fate of a federal criminal who is linked to a local hit-and-run case.HEARTS OF GOLD - Bubba's romance with a high school sweetheart conflicts with the murder investigation of an attorney.(DISC 2)QUICK FIX - Evidence indicates a mentally impaired girl is the mother of an infant found in a shallow grave.HOMECOMING - An ex-convict strives to turn over a new leaf: only to be thwarted at every turn.A PROBLEM TOO PERSONAL - Gillespie appears to be apathetic about prosecuting Harriet Delong's ex-husband, who has been arrested on a murder and robbery charge.A FINAL ARRANGEMENT - An elderly woman who befriended Sweet is found murdered in her bookstore.(DISC 3)FAMILY MATTERS - Titus attempts to reunite his family, only to come up against a rebellious cousin who has led a life of crime.BOUNTY HUNTER - Gillespie must stop a hired bounty hunter who plans to kill a Sparta man wanted for questioning in a Houston murder.BLESSINGS - A local reporter writes an article on an unconsenting Gillespie, who suspects her motives.EXECUTION OF TRUST - A psychiatrist protects a patient who confessed to a murder for which an innocent man stands to be executed.(DISC 4)CHILD OF PROMISE - A drug-related crime wave hits Sparta, and soon murder is on the cards.PAPER CASTLES - A fatal car crash causes suspicion: it is linked with plans to build a new mall in the town.LAID TO WASTE - Gillespie and TIbbs investigate a murder intended to cover up the illegal dumping of toxic waste.FIRST DEADLY SIN - A boy witnesses a rape, but his overprotective father refuses to let him tell the police what he saw.(DISC 5)JUST A COUNTRY BOY - Bubba travels to Los Angeles to arrest an arsonist, but uncovers Mob activity and murder on the way.NO OTHER ROAD - Lonnie Jamison and VIrgil show a despondent Eugene DeLong, who father is facing the death penalty for murder, that life continues.A TURNING - Gillespie and TIbbs track the killers of two drug dealers; Althea worries about the dangers Virgil faces and suggests he change careers.As stated in the product description, due to licensing issues, the episodes "Brotherly Love" and "Shine on Sparta Moon" will not be included in this release.The picture quality to date has been quite good.I'm off to place my order for seasons four and five :0) Anxiously waiting for seasons 3, 6 and 7!
summary: IN THE HEAT OF THE NIGHT SEASON FOUR - SO HAPPY TO SEE MORE RELEASES - DESPITE THE UNUSUAL SEQUENCE/RELEASE SCHEDULE
Title: In The Heat of the Night Season 4

reviewText: The TV series of In The Heat of the Night is the best TV series of all time. I have never saw a bad show. They had the best actors & actresses of all. I love Bill, Bubba, Parker, Jamison, Sweet,Tibbs, & the rest of the gang.The best entertainment TV ever had was this show. Season 4 is an excellent DVD. I'm trying to collect the whole series. I have season 1, season 8, & the marathon, & now season 4. I will be watching for the rest of the series on DVD. I'm so glad this show came out on DVD. I will never be bored. I takes my DVD's with me to work.Thank you for making this series available. It's the greatest!!
summary: In The Heat of the Night Season 4
Title: In The Heat of the Night Season 4

reviewText: In the fourth season, Carroll O'Connor took complete control of the show by firing the entire writing staff, except for Cynthia Deming and William J. Royce, making them Story Editor(s)Virgil and Althea’s twins are born, the murder of a prostitute; a teacher falsely accused of molesting a child, a pregnant mentally disabled child, Harriet's Ex and son gets in trouble, So does Virgil's cousin, a lot to look forwaed to !
summary: In The Heat of the Night Season 4 who's in control ?

Carrol O'Connor brought his character to life, Sherriff Bill Gillespie ... along with Detective Tibbs and all the other officers in this Mississippi town of Sparta.  Every episode is interesting, just a great and entertaining series,

Title: In The Heat of the Night Season 4

reviewText: My wife and I just love this TV series.  We were very happy to see some more episodes released, and for the whole season this time (minus a few shows with licensing issues).  We purchased the past collections that had a few shows from each season, but it was really nice to finally get a whole season at a time, even with a few repeats from prior collections.  We did have to ask for a replacement set due to one of the discs popping loose and rattling around in its case, which scratched it all up so that it wouldn't play.  It was the last disc in the set but luckily we found it just before the 30 day return period ended and we had no problem getting a replacement from Amazon, which is a policy that keeps me coming back to Amazon.  The shows were all excellent except that we haven't yet seen the replacement disc which is currently on its way to us in the mail.  We're sure those episodes are just as good at the others.
Title: In The Heat of the Night Season 4
